January 22, 1953
HAEB TAPE NETWORK
imtos
TO : HAEB BOARD OF DIRECTORS
FROM; NETWORK HEADQUARTERS
RE s ENCLOSED LIST OF TELEPHONE NUMBERS
EL ease find enclosed a list of telephone numbers which I compiled
at the suggestion of Mr® Miles and Mr. Schooley* These a re the tele¬
phone numbers we here at Headquarters have had occasion to us®e -^ho list
contains all the numb&rs we have in our files as of this date.
If you have any pertinent additions to make, please send them to
me and they will bo included in a revised list which will be issued at
a later date.
Rosaline T. Biason
Traffic Manager
